changes_1.pre: For this project we are looking for changes regarding settlements. Compare the upper (before) and lower (after) image and *SWIPE RIGHT* (not tap) to indicate that new settlements have been built.
changes_1.post_correct: Yes, that looks like a new settlement being developed. A big new building has been built here. Swipe left to continue the tutorial.
changes_1.post_wrong: Oh no. Make sure to spot all the new settlements and swipe right. New roads can also function as an indicator sometimes.

changes_2.pre: And again: If new settlements have been built, *SWIPE* to the right side.
changes_2.post_correct: Correct. We can spot new settlements in the lower left part of the satellite image. Swipe left to go on with some more examples.
changes_2.post_wrong: Take a closer look. There are new settlements here in the lower left part of the satellite image.

changes_3.pre: Sometimes settlement might also disappear because they have been pulled down or destroyed. Also for this case *SWIPE RIGHT* to indicate that the situation changed.
changes_3.post_correct: Correct. We can detect some settlements that have been removed here.
changes_3.post_wrong: Take a closer look. There are settlements in the upper image that are not there in lower one.

no_changes_1.pre: In this example, we might spot changes in the vegetation for this imagery pair, but no changes related to settlements. *SWIPE* left to indicate no changes.
no_changes_1.post_correct: Cool. You got it. Just look out for changes concerning settlements. Swipe left to continue.
no_changes_1.post_wrong: Oh no. Not all changes refer to new settlements, some are just related to agriculture or vegetation.

no_changes_2.pre: There is a building but *NO CHANGES* in settlements can be observed here. Again, *SWIPE LEFT*.
no_changes_2.post_correct: Nice. Just watch out for changes referring to settlements.
no_changes_2.post_wrong: Sorry, try again. Don't be distracted by changes in vegetation, just look out for settlements.

no_changes_3.pre: In this example there are already many buildings. But we can't see changes, just a little shift. *SWIPE LEFT*.
no_changes_3.post_correct: Nice. Don't be distracted by the shift in the satellite image.
no_changes_3.post_wrong: Sorry, try again. Don't be distracted by the shift in the satellite image.

maybe_1.pre: Sometimes it might be unclear if settlements emerged. Swipe down if you are not sure.
maybe_1.post_correct: Great. We cannot really tell if the building at the bottom left is a new settlement. This is a 'maybe'.
maybe_1.post_wrong: Are you really sure? Sometimes it's better to mark the imagery as 'not sure'.
